title: Introduction
content: The Lord said: “I give unto you a commandment that you shall teach one another the doctrine of the kingdom. Teach ye diligently and my grace shall attend you” (

Each member of the Church has a sacred responsibility to teach the gospel of Jesus Christ. As shown in the chart below, the Church helps individuals improve their teaching through (1) leader support of teachers, (2) teacher improvement meetings, and (3) the Teaching the Gospel course. This publication presents an overview of teaching in the Church and then outlines these three aspects of teacher improvement.
